name: Imperial Atrocity (V)
Lore: 'The Empire''s ruthless tactics at times unintentionally create support for the cause of the Rebel Alliance.',
Text: 'If you are about to lose Force during opponent''s control phase, deploy on table to reduce loss by 2. Whenever you lose Force during opponent''s control phase (except from a Force drain at a battleground or your card) that loss is cumulatively -1 (to a minimum of 1). Non-[Virtual Block 4] Imperial Atrocity is canceled.',
